mapper.select: select desid destinationId, name, receiver, phone, zipcode, addr, addr_detail addrDetail, default_flag defaultFlag from destination where id = #{id} order by default_flag
mapper.insert: insert into destination (desid, id, name, receiver, phone, zipcode, addr, addr_detail, default_flag) values( concat('des_',lpad(SEQ_DESTINATION.nextval,6,0)), #{id}, #{name}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{defaultFlag})
